live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.

39608.summary: Some customers in Creston are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39608.title: July 15 – Creston | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
